answers.answer: Specialized medical assistance generally includes specialist consultations and specialized ambulatory medical assistance, encompassing services like emergency care, treatment for acute and chronic conditions, family planning, palliative care, and diagnostic services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: Individuals can typically receive specialized ambulatory medical assistance in medical practices, health units, specialized and integrated outpatient clinics within hospitals, diagnostic and treatment medical centers, and palliative care clinics.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: The content implies that individuals usually obtain a specialist consultation by presenting a referral ticket, as it specifies situations where this ticket is not mandatory.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Specialist consultations without a referral ticket are allowed for people coming from the war zones of Ukraine, and for remote consultations concerning chronic conditions or diseases with endemo-epidemic potential requiring isolation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Patients with chronic conditions can receive a maximum of 4 consultations per quarter, or a maximum of 2 consultations per month, for services including evaluation, laboratory investigations, treatment prescription, and disease follow-up.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Day hospitalization services involve a combination of clinical medical services and investigations, lasting less than 12 hours, and can be provided for diagnostic purposes or services like pregnancy monitoring and early detection of precancerous lesions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Medical services that can be delivered remotely include consultations for chronic conditions or endemo-epidemic diseases requiring isolation, psychiatric therapies, psychological counseling, psychotherapy, and services provided by a speech therapist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: After consultations, a specialist doctor can establish therapeutic conduct, prescribe treatment, recommend medical/palliative care at home, suggest medical devices, conduct assessments for chronic conditions, issue referral tickets for other specialties, and issue medical leave certificates.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Patients can access services from a psychologist or physiotherapist if recommended by specialist doctors, provided the outpatient clinic has qualified staff or a contract with a service provider, or specifically for post-COVID-19 conditions through recommendations from cardiology and pneumology doctors.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Services offered by a psychologist include psychological counseling, psychotherapy, and special psychopedagogical counseling, which can also be provided through a speech therapist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Services offered by a physiotherapist include individual or group physiotherapy, and physiotherapy utilizing special devices like mechanical, electromechanical, or robotic devices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Consultations are offered free of charge to insured individuals with a confirmed diagnosis upon leaving the hospital for tracking treatment evolution, performing therapeutic procedures, wound care (e.g., thread/cast removal), and recommendations for necessary paraclinical investigations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.
